author: Perez Hilton
title: Melissa McCarthy Doubles Down On Sean Spicer, 'TV President' Donald Trump Goes To People's Court, And SO Much More On SNL Last Night! Watch!
text:
Saturday Night Live was ON POINT again last night! 
Melissa McCarthy reprised her role as Sean Spicer (above) with another incredible portrayal at a phony press conference, and that was only one of MANY highlights from the show! 
Alec Baldwin hosted, Ed Sheeran came along for the musical ride, and there were a lot of incredible skits — including Baldwin as Donald Trump going to the People's Court as a TV President!! Watch that (below)!!! 
Ha!!! 
It wasn't just Trump that got the business, though — Kellyanne Conway and CNN host Jake Tapper were in SNL 's sights, too, with a now controversial take on a Fatal Attraction type skit. 
Ch-ch-check that out (below)!!! 
LOLz!!! 
And don't forget to check out all the rest of the show's highlights (below) for SO much more: 
SNL is hitting their stride! Ratings are huge! Trump must be angry! 
Ha!!! 
What'd U think of the show last night, Perezcious readers?!
